attributes.action: Everyone gets grade 9 in aqa GCSE Citizenship due to SPaG mistakes in a textbook
attributes.additional_details: It’s not fair that many students are using a poorly written textbook
attributes.background: A textbook used by many taking the course used the wrong spelling of “there” which shows the textbook was not checked over properly before publication

rejection.details: We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.
